metadata.title: CVE-2019-18807 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Two memory leaks in the sja1105_static_config_upload() function indrivers/net/dsa/sja1105/sja1105_spi.c in the Linux kernel before 5.3.5allow attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) bytriggering static_config_buf_prepare_for_upload() or sja1105_inhibit_tx()failures, aka CID-68501df92d11.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
